problem: 问题11. 当 $0<x<2 \pi$ 时, 不等式 $\frac{\cos 2 x+\cos x-1}{\cos 2 x}>2$ 的解集是
solution: $\left(\frac{\pi}{4}, \frac{\pi}{3}\right) \cup\left(\frac{\pi}{2}, \frac{3 \pi}{4}\right) \cup\left(\frac{5 \pi}{4}, \frac{3 \pi}{2}\right) \cup\left(\frac{5 \pi}{3}, \frac{7 \pi}{4}\right)$. 由原不等式得 $\frac{\cos 2 x-\cos x+1}{\cos 2 x}<0 \Leftrightarrow \frac{2 \cos ^2 x-\cos x}{\cos 2 x}<0 \Leftrightarrow\left\{\begin{array}{l}2 \cos ^2 x-\cos x>0 \\ \cos 2 x<0\end{array}\right.$ 或 $\left\{\begin{array}{l}2 \cos ^2 x-\cos x<0 \\ \cos 2 x>0\end{array} \Leftrightarrow x \in\left(\frac{\pi}{4}, \frac{\pi}{3}\right) \cup\left(\frac{\pi}{2}, \frac{3 \pi}{4}\right) \cup\left(\frac{5 \pi}{4}, \frac{3 \pi}{2}\right) \cup\left(\frac{5 \pi}{3}, \frac{7 \pi}{4}\right)\right.$.
